title: Google Assures Chromecast Owners that it’s Working to Fix Streaming Issues
description: Don't worry, it's not part of "the graveyard" yet. The post Google Assures Chromecast Owners that it’s Working to Fix Streaming Issues appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Don't worry, it's not part of "the graveyard" yet.
text: Following an outage which rendered countless Google Chromecast owners unable to watch anything on their devices, Google has now acknowledged the issue and assured users that it’s finding a way to resolve the problem, which was caused by a software bug. READ: Google stops selling the Chromecast with Google TV It should be noted that the company has advised users NOT to reset their devices, as this could cause users to be locked out of their devices. Google has not specified the exact cause of the streaming issue, which displays the “untrusted device error” on older Chromecast models such as the Chromecast 2015 model and Chromecast Audio. A while back, Google discontinued sales of its Chromecast with Google TV, following the launch of the Google TV Streamer last year, which is a bit more expensive at around a hundred bucks. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. html:
Following an outage which rendered countless Google Chromecast owners unable to watch anything on their devices, Google has now acknowledged the issue and assured users that it’s finding a way to resolve the problem, which was caused by a software bug.

READ: Google stops selling the Chromecast with Google TV

It should be noted that the company has advised users NOT to reset their devices, as this could cause users to be locked out of their devices. Google has not specified the exact cause of the streaming issue, which displays the “untrusted device error” on older Chromecast models such as the Chromecast 2015 model and Chromecast Audio.

A while back, Google discontinued sales of its Chromecast with Google TV, following the launch of the Google TV Streamer last year, which is a bit more expensive at around a hundred bucks.

Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.

A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart.
